metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9580 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow vulnerability was found in tiftoimage function inopenjpeg 2.1.2, resulting in heap buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjp2-7 - 2.3.0-1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.3.0-1
libopenjp3d-tools - 2.3.0-1
libopenjp3d7 - 2.3.0-1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.3.0-1
libopenjpip-server - 2.3.0-1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.3.0-1
libopenjpip7 - 2.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-1').
